tasks.title: Initialize React + Vite project with Tailwind CSS
tasks.testCriteria: Dev server runs on localhost and Tailwind classes work

tasks.title: Build color picker component
tasks.testCriteria: Can select colors via picker UI and color changes are reflected visually

tasks.title: Implement hex code display
tasks.testCriteria: Hex code updates in real-time and is properly formatted (#RRGGBB)

tasks.title: Add copy-to-clipboard functionality
tasks.testCriteria: Click button copies hex to clipboard with toast/message feedback

tasks.title: Apply dark theme styling
tasks.testCriteria: All components use dark theme with accessible contrast ratios

tasks.title: Build production bundle
tasks.testCriteria: npm run build succeeds and build size is under 500KB

tasks.title: Deploy to Vercel
tasks.testCriteria: Site loads at public URL with all features working, no console errors
